#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long t;
std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
	long long num1,num2,sum;
	cin>>num1>>num2>>sum;
	long long no_term=(2*sum)/(num1+num2);
    long long diff=(num2-num1)/(no_term-5);
    long long first=num1-2*diff;
    cout<<no_term<<endl;
    for(long long i=0;i<no_term;i++)
    {
        cout<<first<<" ";
        first+=diff;
    }
    cout<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
